summary: Completed testing of FeedbackVault Phase 2 enhancements including AI-powered insights and business item management. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 34 tests passing. Frontend has login integration issues preventing full testing of authenticated features.

integration_issues.issue: Login form not submitting properly despite backend API working correctly
AI Insights component present but may not be loading data properly

passed_tests: AI Insights API endpoint /api/ai/insights/{item_id} returns proper data structure
AI Insights API includes summary, sentiment_score, key_strengths, areas_for_improvement, popular_tags
Business item management API /api/business/items working correctly
Business item CRUD operations (create, update, delete) all functional
Business variant management APIs working correctly
Item detail page loads and displays item information
AI Insights component present in item detail sidebar
Write Review button present (disabled for unauthenticated users)
Business owner account creation via API working
Category and item management APIs functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form submission issue. The backend login API works correctly (tested via curl), but the frontend form is not submitting properly, preventing testing of authenticated features like business item management and AI insights display. This blocks full testing of the new Phase 2 features.
